ygData.msgSnippet: NightViper turned looking Her over. Predicon... Thisss word... Yesss I remember, Hmmm. He smiled and holstered his Crossbow. I am at your command My liege.

NightViper turned looking Her over. "Predicon... Thisss word... Yesss 
I remember, Hmmm." He smiled and holstered his Crossbow. "I am at 
your command My liege." He kneeled bowing. "Forgive me for my 
Ssshameful action jussst now." 
*********************************

The pod sparked and began to function again and a bio-scan emerged... 
Soon the suitable form was found. The lid hissed open, and out 
stepped a large well built robot. He had mane like hair, and his 
forearms and lower legs were covered in white fur. his face was kind 
and gentle and he stood atleast six feet tall. his chest had two 
metal straps making a large "X" across his blue chest the maximal 
symbol in a jewel in the middle his hands were large claws, and two 
cannon like barrels were laying flat against his back, and a whip was 
wound and clipped to his side. "I am Convoy, A medical officer 
elite." "May i ask who i am speaking with now, i can see we all are 
allies." He looked from Windlord then to WingRazor.
